kingdom.quote: Meus pais seguiram as estrelas por mil, mil ciclos.
kingdom.long_description: Corajosos e resistentes, os homens e mulheres do norte vivem pela visão de um novo amanhecer sobre território inexplorado. Munidos de bússola e machadinha, eles se orgulham de sua tenaz adaptabilidade.

hunting.hungry_rabbit_raid: Uma ninhada de coelhos está indo para suas fazendas!

banner_upgrade.title: Assentamento Estabelecido
banner_upgrade.reward_message_ctd: ser um assentamento que se esforça para estar em harmonia com o meio ambiente.

bulletin_message.00:
Sua voz toma a cadência de uma recitação de palavras faladas mil vezes antes. "Valin criou nossa Aliança para compartilhar nossa abundância, adaptar-se às dificuldades e buscar o horizonte. A Aliança do Norte se tornará uma com os ciclos e estrelas de Hearth."

Ela inclina a cabeça em questionamento. "Qual das nossas filosofias seu povo mais deseja incorporar?"

Uma mulher está perto do acampamento. Ela utiliza roupas semelhantes ha de um Escoteiro.

Ninguém a viu chegar, mas ela já está nos assistindo há algum tempo.

"Ronia" ela diz, apontando para si mesma. Sua voz é estrangulada. Como se para poder explicar, ela puxa-se o colarinho para longe de sua garganta, revelando uma confusão de velhas cicatrizes. Ela gesticula para a faca. "Eu escuto." Então ela bate o broche em forma de estrela em seu manto. "For Valin"s Library."

Ela fala tanto com as mãos e olhos quanto com a voz: "Estou feliz que você tenha vindo se estabelecer. Agora que eu sei que você está aqui, vou enviar contos de seus aprendizados para os estudiosos em casa."

Ela caminha até a bandeira e toca no centro. "Primeiro, porém, você deve escolher seu símbolo. Que futuro você previu quando começou esta viagem?"

Ronia está agora parada na beira do fogo. Ela escreveu o nome da cidade de seus habitantes na carta mágica em branco. Em seguida, ela joga a carta sobre as chamas, que queimam forte por um momento.

"[str(i18n_data.town_name)]" she intones. "Pela sabedoria de Valin e sob o olhar atento das estrelas acima, estejamos comprometidos com esse registro."

msg2.bulletin_title: Ela sorri apenas com os olhos
msg2.dialog_title: Ela sorri apenas com os olhos

bulletin_message.00: "Aqueles que importam, ouvirão." Ela se curva, e desaparece aos poucos no deserto. "Adeus," ela gesticula. "Eu voltarei para suas histórias."

"Muito obrigado," Ronia sussurra, e de seu gesto, fica claro que ela quer dizer "pela sua hospitalidade e presença."

Ela coloca uma pequena bolsa ao lado da bandeira. Do seu lado é um emblema da cidade grande mais próxima, alguns dias distante. "Nossas cidades são estrelas na constelação do nosso povo," Ela diz. "Para você, que um dia você se junte a eles."

A bolsa contém:

"Que sabedoria tem seu assentamento, que deseja passar para o resto do nosso povo? Essa riqueza deve ser compartilhada? Que é possível construir fortes contra o frio? Que nós caçamos, mesmo sabendo que, por sua vez, podemos nos tornar caçados?"

Ela inclina a cabeça. "Estou ansioso por sua escolhas. Enquanto isso ... um presente para lembrá-lo da primavera." Ela coloca um pequeno pacote ao lado da bandeira.
Ronia gestures at the camp, smiling approval. "I have come again to pass your stories to the Library," she indicates. She sits by the fire, produces another birch shaving, and waits.

msg2.choice_000: Well, since you were last here...

bulletin_message.00: Ronia meticulously notes everyone’s adventures in runes on the birchbark, and again commits them to the flames. "Your fleck of light is growing. Soon, your hearth will draw others, and someday, it too will be a star in the constellation of our people."

Ronia appears again at the edge of camp.

How long has she been standing there, observing?
"A Hearth of the Makers is for those who believe that a house is a place of learning and creation, and that the things we build are best traded so we may all grow wise together."
Ronia concludes: "Cheer, Makers, and Glory, the choice of your path lights the way for all who follow you. In Valin's wisdom and under the auspices of Firnn, Knut, and Siv…"
She taps her brooch. "The Library is pleased with your progress." She bends, and touches the stones of your hearth. "Now it is time to choose the beacon that will represent your settlement."

"Valin teaches that a home is a bulwark against the elements; a place to find succor and friendship. The Hearth of Cheer draws together all who seek to create a warmth that no blizzard can dissipate."

Sua voz assume um tom rouco: "O professor Cid viu as fogueiras como estrelas terrenas, iluminando nosso conhecimento do mundo. Desde o momento em que demos as costas à Fênix, elas queimaram para mostrar aos céus que conhecemos nosso lugar na Terra. Estrelas de Hearth."

Ela aguarda uma resposta apropriada.
"At last, the Hearth of Glory reminds us that to survive in the farthest reaches, we must hone our bodies and minds to their utmost, for anything less is to fall prematurely into the cold."
Ronia appears at the edge of camp, smiling, arms spread to encompass all that has been built since her last appearance. "Stars bless your learnings," she whispers. "Shall I hear your tales?"

intro.choice_001: [skip] We know what Hearth we want.

hearth_upgrade.title: Settlement Established
hearth_upgrade.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
hearth_upgrade.reward_message_ctd: to be a settlement out to prove that its riches and craftsmanship is unmatched.

bulletin_message.00:
Ronia dips again into a poetic cadence: "Firnn the Stag, from whose hooves fall the favors of summer: bless this town with prosperity, and the wisdom to live in harmony with the cycles of the land."
(Building a Font of Summer will grant all your townsfolk a +1 boost to the mind, body, and spirit attributes.)

Ronia continues: "Knut the Swift, who turns the wheel of fortune: bless this town with a moment of great prosperity, and the foresight to store favor against the reversals to come.
(Building a Font of Fortune will grant the ability to create masterwork quality furniture and decorations, which are considerably better than those of excellent quality.)

"By the wisdom of Valin and the guidance of the Library, it is time to request the favor of the constellation that best reflects for you, the philosophy that guides our people." She produces three scrolls, which she distributes to those gathered around her. "Create thoughtfully, and let the spirits hear the wisdom in your deeds."

Ronia finishes: "And Siv the Wolf, whose breath steams the icy winter as he chases fleeting prey: bless this town with resilience, so that we stand against the cold in our time of strength, and accept our return to the earth when that time is over."
(Building a Font of Fire will grant you additional strength in combat and a +2 to the body attribute.)

Ronia shakes her head fondly. "Did you expect the stars to come visit you on earth? They are spirits, not beasts. They are Valin's allegories, committed to the heavens so we do not forget his teachings."

"It is time to create a monument, and ask for the blessings of your patron spirit. Then I will record your settlement as a star in the constellation of the Northern Alliance, and your stories will be safe in the Library of our people. Have you made your choice?"

bulletin_message.00: Ronia falls into a hunter's crouch and bares her teeth. The wolf bares its fangs back. Then as one, they both raise their chins, exposing their throats. Ronia's hand touches the wolf's ruff, and it sniffs once at the scars on her neck.

The wolf slowly turns its head and the people around it pause, overtaken by a vision: a flash of wind in the face as they bound across a snowy plain, the scent of their prey connecting them like a thread. Each hunter will eat tonight or die, their bodies returning to the earth. The simplicity of it straightens each spine. Tonight, all know their place in the world. A moment later, the wolf is gone.
A low growl saturates the air around the campfire. Around two sparks of the hearth, a wolf forms, white like winter, save for its brilliant yellow eyes.

msg1.dialog_title: A wolf with eyes like embers

bulletin_message.00: Ronia kneels before the rabbit and cups her hands so it might hop into them. She walks it slowly towards the celebration. The rabbit's ears swivel in every direction, taking in the festivities.

The rabbit turns to sniff in the direction of the fire, and amidst the embers a vision appears: a constellation of towns emblazoned across a map, and dozens, hundreds, thousands of stories collected of their learnings. Visions of finely crafted goods waft through the smoke, creating kinship between those who have created, and those who will learn from their advancements and create anew. Then the creature leaps from Ronia's hands, and into the crowd.
At the edge of the new monument, a rabbit appears. It wears the purple shadows around it like a cloak. Its ears are the color of the sky between stars and its eyes pierce like the sun on snow.

msg1.dialog_title: A rabbit with fur like the night sky

bulletin_message.00: Ronia approaches the stag with a low bow, so low her hair scrapes the ground, and gestures it towards the hearth. The music seems to entice it closer.

The stag turns, a light flashes through each person standing nearby. Everyone seems energized: stronger, wiser, braver. Then the creature turns its head from the fire, and seems to melt into the air, becoming one with the festivities as the town has become one with the Alliance.

At the edge of the celebration, a creature emerges from the shadows. It looks like a particularly fine stag, but its horns shine crystal in moonlight, and its spots glitter like tiny stars. A glowing wreath appears around its neck.

Ronia considers the fountain. "What learnings will you pursue next? The other monuments would look good beside this one, though they will not have the power to call the constellations." She smiles. "Your town has all it needs, does it not?"

Ronia touches her breast. "You warm my heart." She takes a step backwards, and makes an all-encompassing gesture of farewell. Her eyes blaze, a reminder that the Scouts of Valin travel forever away from civilization, to places even more wild and dangerous than these.

"As Valin teaches, each precious moment must be held dear against the inevitable change of the weather."
Ronia watches as the party quiets. "That was well done," she whispers. "Your township is officially entered into the annals of The Library, and the spirits grace your steps."

When Ronia appears for the last time, it is with a golden banner in her hands. It is a twin to the one this town embarked with, so long ago. She tilts her head with a smile and gestures at the horizon. She doesn't need to speak. Hearth is waiting.

Re-embarking allows you to carry over up to 3 citizens, 10 items, and all your unlocked recipes when starting a new town.

guildmaster.description:
This town will be known for its resourceful crafts, refined from the materials nearby.
  • Allows crafting Masterwork quality items

deity.description:
This town shall share the bounty of the land with those still suffering from winter.
  • Blesses all citizens with +1 to Mind, Body, and Spirit

valor.description:
This town will be known by the foes it has defeated, and stand in defiance of those who would extinguish its flame.
  • Blesses all citizens with a +2 to Body

bulletin_message.00: She offers a tiny smile as she cocks her head. "Surprised?" her expression seems to say. Two fingers of one hand mime a person tiptoeing through the grass. Her blue cloak seems to take on the color of the sky around her.

She gestures at the newest additions to the town and nods in approval. Her cloak is flung back, and it is clear the scars stretch around her neck in the shape of a wolf’s jaw. Today, they look a bit inflamed.

She settles by the fire and produces the birch bark and charcoal pencil again. With a nod, she invites those around her to recount their recent adventures.

As Ronia records the tales and casts them into the fire, she grows thoughtful. In the end, she nods to herself, and produces, from her pouch, three smooth stones.

They each bear a familiar scratched marking: One is the constellation of Firnn the Stag, often associated with bounty, and summer. One is the constellation of Siv the Wolf, who ensures each hunt contributes to the cycle of the world. The last is the tiny three stars of Knut the Rabbit, who spins the wheel of fortune.

As she does so, she places the stones by the fire, and bows her head in prayer. "It is time," she whispers. "When I next return, I will bring the spirits and we will create the monument to ask for their blessing."

hunting_party.description: A floresta está cheia de animais. Animais espertos e Saborosos. Os arqueiros podem caçá-los e o cozinheiro pode transformá-los em pedaços deliciosos.
hunting_party.tooltip: A caça é uma fonte de alimento em pouca quantidade, mas os arqueiros, além de caçar, podem fazer o dever duplo como guardas da cidade.
